Class org.apache.hadoop.util.LineReader

Added Constructors
LineReader(InputStream, byte[]) Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the default buffer-size and using a custom delimiter of array of bytes.
LineReader(InputStream, int, byte[]) Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the given buffer-size and using a custom delimiter of array of bytes.
LineReader(InputStream, Configuration, byte[]) Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the io.file.buffer.size specified in the given Configuration and using a custom delimiter of array of bytes.
